description: Azure DevOps - CI/CD and project management platform

common_errors.solution: Generate new Personal Access Token (PAT), check token scope and expiration, verify organization access
Check task logs, verify agent capabilities, review variable group access, check service connection

common_errors.cause: No available agent for pipeline job
common_errors.solution: Check agent pool status, verify agent capabilities match demands, start or add agents

common_errors.cause: Service connection configuration or authorization issue
common_errors.solution: Verify service connection credentials, check connection authorization for pipeline, update expired secrets

common_errors.cause: Build artifact publish or download failed
common_errors.solution: Check artifact path configuration, verify storage quota, review artifact retention settings

common_errors.cause: Insufficient permissions for Azure DevOps operation
common_errors.solution: Check project/repo permissions, verify pipeline permissions, add user to appropriate security group

common_errors.cause: Pipeline YAML syntax or template error
common_errors.solution: Validate YAML syntax, check template references and parameters, use YAML validator
Check repository access permissions, configure Git LFS if needed, review submodule configuration

common_errors.cause: Pipeline variable not found or misconfigured
common_errors.solution: Define variable in pipeline or variable group, check variable group linking, verify secret access

common_errors.cause: Build/run deleted due to retention policy
common_errors.solution: Adjust retention policy, mark important builds as retained, increase retention limits
